question: Sudarshan lake repaired second time under the reign of _?
explanation: The Junagarh inscription gives the information about the Sudarshan lake that the lake was an artificial reservoir, was built by the Mauryan emperors for checking floods. Around 150 AD, the lake was repaired by the Shaka ruler Rudradaman-I. And, it was again repaired under the Skandguptaâ€™s reign (415 AD- 455 AD) by his governor Parnadatta.
